TheWord.ScriptureReference: Song of Solomon 5:6, Hosea 11:1, Romans 1:7, Romans 8:28, 1 John 3:1
TheWord.Title: When Love calls ...

Prophet.Commentary: I opened to my beloved; but my beloved had withdrawn himself, and was gone: my soul failed when he spoke: I sought him, but I could not find him; I called him, but he gave me no answer (Song of Solomon 5:6). When Israel was a child, then I loved him, and called my son out of Egypt (Hosea 11:1). To all that be in Rome, beloved of God, called to be saints: Grace to you and peace from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ (Romans 1:7). And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to His purpose (Romans 8:28). Behold, what manner of love the Father has bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knows us not, because it knew him not (1 John 3:1).

CaseBasedReasoning.Commentary: Left fingers twitches. Faeces: 1. Shower. Kokuho Rice U.S. #1 Extra Fancy New Crop Net Wt. 20LBS 9.07kg.

ClassAssociates.Commentary: Shutdown the left computer, Comfort ... Comfort computer noise. Kokuho Rice U.S. #1 Extra Fancy New Crop Net Wt. 20LBS 9.07kg ... Smell. Turn on the computer: Smell ... Left fingers twitches ... Keyboard error.
